Title.Language: Doxology for St. Joseph the Carpenter

Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Joseph the Carpenter:

Text.Language: Vnou] afcwtp n~Iwcev: hina n~tefa~reh ]paryenoc: qen pefh~i qen hanm/nu: n~e~pouranion.
The Lord chose Joseph, with a heavenly sign, to take care of the Virgin, in his house.
